name: Volcom
reviews: Right off the bat, let's talk color. I was looking at the burnt sienna for a while but I was worried that they were going to be too orange and/or too bright. They aren't. The product photo is pretty close to what you get. In bright light like in the photo of me wearing them, they do appear lighter but it's not obnoxious.I would refer to these more as burgundy than orange but color perception can be variable across people.I am not the kind of person who wears bright colored shorts that stand out. My other shorts are tan, light grey, dark gray, khaki... These burnt sienna shorts are on the edge of my comfort zone but I really like them!As for the shorts themselves, I love them. I already have several other pairs of Volcom shorts. They are casual but look polished. The length falls at my knee (I'm 6 feet tall). They have a slightly slim cut so they aren't baggy. Deep front pockets. Normal back pockets, no button closure.(they are wrinkly on me because I put them on straight out of the bag)
